page.title: 09TOURIST CARAVAN SITES
page.content: {THREE-WAYS CARAVAN CLUB SITE.} LORD ST.LEVAN OWNS THE SITE BUT IT IS LEASED TO THE CARAVAN CLUB. THE SITE COVERS TWO-HALF ACRES AT THE TOP OF FRIENDSHIP HILL BETWEEN PLAIN AN GWARRY AND ST.HILARY. IT HOLDS UP TO 70 CARAVANS AND IS OPEN FROM GOOD FRIDAY TO THE FIRST MONDAY IN OCTOBER. MEMBERS OF THE CARAVAN CLUB ONLY ARE ALLOWED TO USE THE CAMP,WHICH PROVIDES ONLY WATER AND TOILET FACILITIES-THERE BEING NO SHOPS ON THE SITE. {WHEAL RODNEY CARAVAN SITE.} THIS SITE IN GWALLON LANE,{MARAZION,} HAS A LARGE NUMBER OF PERMANENT CARAVANS FOR HOLIDAYMAKERS AS WELL AS FACILITIES FOR TOURIST CARAVANS.
